title: Patient-Reported Outcome Measures in Individuals With Hereditary or Sporadic Kidney Cancer

summary.text: The collaboration of multidisciplinary teams in an Italian VHL clinic has facilitated comprehensive patient care for individuals with hereditary kidney cancer.
Patient-reported outcome measures are essential for assessing quality of life and symptom burden in kidney cancer patients, enabling personalized management strategies.
Regular monitoring using standardized tools helps identify early signs of complications or disease progression, allowing timely interventions to improve outcomes.
